amendment.description: Amendment originally sought to delete $50 million appropriated for the Global Environment Facility. \ As amended by the Porter amendment (A017), $30 million is appropriated for the Global Environment Facility.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 17 in the Congressional Record of June 20, 1995 to delete the $50 million in funds appropriated in the bill for the Global Environment Facility.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLay amendment (A015) as amended Agreed to by recorded vote: 273 - 146 (Roll no. 427).
